subject: Self Care
title: Focused Attention Meditation
description: A fast breakdown of Focused Attention Meditation for builders.

hook.text: Pick one thing â€” your breath. When the mind wanders, return. That's the entire practice. Simple, not easy.

buildup.text: Focused attention meditation trains concentration by anchoring awareness on a single chosen object.

discovery.text: The object is usually the breath, a mantra, or a candle flame. Simplicity keeps the anchor accessible.

twist.text: The goal isn't to never wander. Each return to the anchor is one repetition. Wandering is the exercise.

climax.text: This is the foundation style. Most other meditation forms build on the concentration skills it develops.

punchline.text: Focus, wander, return. That's the whole practice.
